artist: Designer: Larsen Design Studio; Producer: Jack Lenor Larsen, Inc.
description: Very fine plain weave.  Some color changes form a horiz., random stripe. very fine plain weave. Puce(maybe carnation)
image_copyright: Â© Jack Lenor Larsen%2C Inc.%2C Larsen Design Studio
portfolio: From Anthology; This colorway is for The Great Color of China
text: Iridescent Suga Silk is a luxurious silk casement that originated with the Anthology collection in 1970. Larsen reformulated the colorways when the fabric joined the Great Color of China collection, adding Peach, Saffron, Aquamarine, Celadon, Puce and Carnation. These brilliant colors are brighter and clearer in tone than the muted palette of the Dunhuang murals, and served as accents to the earthier mineral hues.
title: Suga Silk
